page.title: 11Family Life(contd.).
page.content: {Lee and Carrie's Weekend} On Saturday Lee wakes up at 7 o'clock and Carrie wakes up at 8.Lee watches T.V until the 'Wide Awake Club' comes on,then he gets dressed.Carrie gets up then.Dad has gone to work and mum is downstairs.We watch the 'Wide Awake Club' on the colour T.V then soon after we get the computer on.The computer comes off at dinnertime and we take it back upstairs.Dad comes in for his dinner about 12:30. After dinner dad watches the sport and mum goes to Letham with Carrie.When mum and Carrie come home and Lee has his bath(after feeding and mucking out the pigs)we have tea then watch T.V. On Sunday the programme is similar exept that we get up later and watch less T.V.We attend the Monthly Family Service at church and when the weather is fine we often go for a picnic.
